title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: J.A.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black, red ink on cream illustration board
markings: On verso, upside down, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: J.A.; upper right corner: 690; in red ink: APRES LA PLUIE ... LE BEAU TEMPS
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram comprised of a "J" in the form of an open umbrella with curved handle indicated the bottom of the "J", next to an "A" in the form of a closed umbrella, the tapering shade indicating the diagonal elements of the "A."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: J.A.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black, red ink on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-77.
